trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: A BuildPropertyGroup object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties.
trans-unit.target: BuildPropertyGroup 物件可代表專案中或虛擬屬性，例如全域屬性或環境變數的屬性集合中的項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new PropertyGroup element in the specified project.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的 PropertyGroup 項目中指定的專案。

trans-unit.source: See [PropertyGroup Element (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information on property groups.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[PropertyGroup 項目 (MSBuild)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)如需有關屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: The name of the Project in which to add the new PropertyGroup.
trans-unit.target: 這是加入新的 PropertyGroup 中專案的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將新<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>具有指定<> *> 和<> *> 來<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>要指派新的屬性值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>要指派新的屬性值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> and <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> to the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將新<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>具有指定<> *> 和<> *> 來<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>要指派新的屬性值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>要指派新的屬性值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to treat the `propertyValue` parameter as a literal value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要將`propertyValue`參數做為常值; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The new <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup.Condition*> property value and all <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup.Condition*>屬性值與所有<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>物件從<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup.Condition*>

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep or shallow copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立的淺層複本<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A shallow copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> references the same property group as the original.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>參考相同的屬性群組，與原始。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: Modifications a shallow copy will be reflected in both copies.
trans-unit.target: 淺層複本會反映在這兩個複本的修改。

trans-unit.source: A deep copy of a <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> creates a new XML element to reference so that both copies of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> can be independently modified.
trans-unit.target: 深層複本<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>建立新的 XML 項目參考，讓同時複製的<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>可以獨立地進行修改。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> </xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> corresponds directly to a element in the project (rather than corresponding to a collection of virtual properties, such as environment variable and global properties), only deep copies are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>直接對應到專案中的項目 (而不是對應至虛擬屬性集合，例如環境變數和全域屬性)、 深度只允許複製。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to create a deep copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要建立的深層複本<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一份<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the `Condition` attribute value of the property group.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定`Condition`屬性值的屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: The `Condition` attribute value of the property group.
trans-unit.target: `Condition`屬性值的屬性群組。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> objects in the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出數目<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>中的物件<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup> object can represent a element in the project, or a virtual collection of properties, such as global properties or environment variable properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>物件可代表專案中或虛擬屬性，例如全域屬性或環境變數的屬性集合中的項目。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>

trans-unit.source: An integer value representing the number of <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，代表數<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得可逐一查看的列舉值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method allows the caller to use the `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) to iterate through the individual <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty> objects in the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓呼叫端使用`foreach`C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each`中[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) 來逐一查看個別<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty><xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup>中的物件</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the entire <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>整個<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the property group was imported into the project.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出屬性群組是否已匯入專案。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property group was imported into the project; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性群組已匯入專案。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>物件在這個<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to get or set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>来取得或設定。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> object in this <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>從<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> from the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>具有指定<xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>從<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildPropertyGroup"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>移除。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the condition for imported property groups.
trans-unit.target: 設定匯入的屬性群組的條件。

trans-unit.source: Changes are not persisted.
trans-unit.target: 不會保存變更。

trans-unit.source: The condition to add to the imported PropertyGroup.
trans-unit.target: 要匯入 PropertyGroup 中加入的條件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<> *> 的<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>具有指定<> *>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*> property value of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> to set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>屬性值為<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>設定。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> property value to assign the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>要指派屬性值<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"> </xref>。</xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Value*> of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref> with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty.Name*>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<> *> 的<xref href="Microsoft.Build.BuildEngine.BuildProperty"></xref>具有指定<> *>。
